name: @react-ssr-pack/resolve-plugin
description: Webpack resolve plugin for resolving react-proxy in React SSR application based on React v18 and @react-ssr-pack
author: Anton Frolov

scripts.watch:to:lib: echo Watch mode not supported && exit 1
scripts.watch:to:app: echo Watch mode not supported && exit 1
scripts.watch:to:app:types: echo Watch mode not supported && exit 1
